post.text: More people will early vote in 2016 than ever before. Join them: hillaryclinton.com/makeaplan

comment.author: Abigail
comment.text: I will vote but not for you,your pathetic and nothing but a Liar and traitor to our united states! Trump for me

replies.author: Amy
replies.text: This man admitted in his own VOICE that he ASSAULTED women! He has demonstrated over and over that he is a hated filled, vindictive individual who thinks none of the law applies to him because he is a "star" and is "rich." I can not for the life of me understand how anyone, particularly a WOMAN could vote for this mysogynistic PIG who admires Putin, a man who would destroy us at first opportunity, and has strong ties to RussiA!!
